resources.string: Recycling is the process of collecting and processing materials that would otherwise be thrown away as trash and turning them into new products.
Is recycling truly beneficial for the environment ?
Yes, reliable data has shown that recycling conserves energy, natural resources and also protects the planet.
How does recycling save energy ?

When we make new products out of virgin materials, we expend energy to extract and process those materials. However, if we manufacture products using recycled materials, we reduce the need for virgin materials and save the energy required to extract and process them.
What are the do’s and don’ts of recycling ?
Do: when recycling plastic bottles please ensure that all lids and covers are not taken out
Do: Separate plastics, cans and paper in different packages
Don’t: Recycle food. Make sure your food cans, bottles, and containers are clean of all food residue before putting them in to the recycling bin.
Do: Try to reuse items that are not recyclable
Don’t: Do not recycle plastic shopping bags with other recyclables.
Do: It is best practice to break down cardboard down to optimize the space in your recycling package.
Don’t: P.E.T bottles are slightly different from other plastic so please do not mix P.E.T bottles in the same stack or package with other plastics.
Why am I unable to install U-cycle Scrap app on my phone ?
Ensure to have minimum Android 5.0 (lollipop) version on your device. If after wards problems persists please contact U-cycle help care channels.
How do I best manage my collections before U-cycle pick up ?
Most users prefer to use nylon bin bags to store their recyclables separately while awaiting pickup.
How long does it take for U-cycle order to be picked up ?
Generally the waiting period for pickup is within 2 to 7 days depending on the pickup location.
Do I get paid for recycling through the U-cycle ecosystem ?
Yes, depending on your preference you can get cash, mobile phone units or gift items for your recyclables.
Can I exchange my used plastic for other useful items ?
Yes, depending on the value of your recyclables you will be able to select items listed on our online store in exchange for your plastics.
How do I purchase items on the U-cycle Store ?

To purchase Items on the U-cycle store you will first select the credit my wallet option when checking out your orders and then make your desired purchases which will then be delivered to you upon your next pickup date
How much can I make from recycling ?
According to our survey an average household can gather a minimum of up to 15 - 20kg of recyclable materials ranging from plastics to metal and tin cans within a 1 month period.
When do I get paid for my waste ?

Once our agents arrive at you location and confirm your order items, you will get paid immediately. The exception arises if you selected the “credit my U-cycle wallet” option which you will receive a credit notification on your app within 24 hours.
What is the RCY token ?
The Recycle token (RCY) is the native currency of the U-cycle recycling ecosystem. The value of 1 Rcy is equivalent to the value of 10kg of plastic waste. i.e. 1 RCY = 10kg of plastic.
Can I redeem my RCY token balance for Naira ?
Yes. If you have Rcy token in your wallet you can easily convert it to naira and transfer to your regular bank account.
How is the value of my waste calculated ?
The value of the recyclables you select are calculated by the estimated weight of each item and the prevailing rate of the material price per kg.
Can I purchase Items on the U-Cycle store without participating in the U-cycle ecosystem ?
No.
How do I know the type of plastic material a product is made of ?
There is information of the type of plastic a product is made of engraved under the item. It is usually in the form P.E.T, P.P, H.D.P.E etc.
